li.label: Animal Empathy
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} is a friend to animals of all kinds. {PAWN_pronoun} would never harm them, and they would never harm {PAWN_objective}.

li.label: slob
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} is a complete slob. {PAWN_pronoun} tracks in dirt, tosses trash everywhere, and refuses to clean up.

li.label: Caravaneer
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} has a natural talent for logistics. {PAWN_possessive} leadership allows caravans to move 15% faster.

li.label: Boring
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} justs keeps talking in one long incredibly unbroken sentence moving from topic to topic so that no-one has a chance to interrupt; it is really quite hypnotic.

li.label: Teacher
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} loves to help people learn. {PAWN_pronoun} will teach a little something to everybody {PAWN_pronoun} talks to.

li.label: Spawn of Satan
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} bears the mark of the Prince of Darkness, the King of Hell, the Father of Lies: Lucifer himself. None know for what reason {PAWN_pronoun} has come to this world, or what dark plan {PAWN_pronoun} aims to enact, only that in {PAWN_possessive} wake, death and destruction follow. Be afraid.

li.label: Drunken Master
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} is a master of Zuì Quán: drunken boxing. Or at least, it seems that way when {PAWN_pronoun}'s wasted. The more {PAWN_pronoun} drinks, the better {PAWN_pronoun} fights.

li.label: Berserker
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} has a fury simmering deep within {PAWN_objective}. In combat, {PAWN_pronoun} may fly into a berserker rage, becoming an uncontrollable whirlwind of destruction.

li.label: Juggernaut
li.description: Whether due to strength, agility, or stupidity, {PAWN_nameDef} cannot be stopped. {PAWN_pronoun} cannot be stunned, and will not be staggered by attacks.
